tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_donor_orgsgroups AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.org_grp_name, COALESCE(v.org_grp_id, -999999999) AS org_grp_id, v.terms_assist_id, v.financing_instrument_id, COALESCE(v.donor_org_id, -999999999) AS donor_org_id, v.mode_of_payment_id, v.funding_status_id, v.agreement_id, v.funding_id, v.vulnerable_group_id, v.project_results_available_id, v.country_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.amp_activity_id, orgs.org_grp_name AS org_grp_name, orgs.org_grp_id AS org_grp_id, d.terms_assist_id, d.financing_instrument_id, d.donor_org_id, d.mode_of_payment_id, d.funding_status_id, d.agreement_id, d.funding_id, d.vulnerable_group_id, d.project_results_available_id, d.country_id FROM v_ni_donor_orgs d JOIN ni_all_orgs_dimension orgs ON orgs.org_id = d.org_id ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
